UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.EmoteCollect: A collection of emotes this device controls, only works in UEFN
UserOptionDefinition.BP_EmoteController_Device_C.Enable Playe: Attaches a music reactive particle effect to all players in the volume
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Enable Playe: Attaches a music reactive particle effect to all players in the volume
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.bBlockDances: Blocks all dance emotes on the island. Only one Emote Controller device needs this to be on for dances to get blocked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.bBlockEmojis: Blocks all emoji emotes on the island. Only one Emote Controller device needs this to be on for emojis to get blocked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.bBlockSprays: Blocks all spray emotes on the island. Only one Emote Controller device needs this to be on for sprays to get blocked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.bBlockToys.D: Blocks all toy emotes on the island. Only one Emote Controller device needs this to be on for toys to get blocked.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Enabled On P: Determines what Phase this device will be automatically enabled on. If not enabled, this device cannot be interacted with by event, other than to enable it.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_EmoteController_Device_C.Disable.Desc: Disable the Emote Controller, unblocking the blocked emotes or removing the granted emote
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Disable.Desc: Disable the Emote Controller, unblocking the blocked emotes or removing the granted emote
UserOptionDefinition.BP_EmoteController_Device_C.Enable.Descr: Enable the Emote Controller, allowing it to block and grant emotes
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Enable.Descr: Enable the Emote Controller, allowing it to block and grant emotes
UserOptionDefinition.BP_EmoteController_Device_C.Grant All Pl: Gives all players in the island an item that triggers the emote specified by Item Emote ID. The item will have the appearance and name of the specified emote in the player's inventory. The emote can be triggered by firing with the item equipped.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Grant All Pl: Gives all players in the island an item that triggers the emote specified by Item Emote ID. The item will have the appearance and name of the specified emote in the player's inventory. The emote can be triggered by firing with the item equipped.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_EmoteController_Device_C.Grant Player: Gives the instigating player an item that triggers the emote specified by Item Emote ID. The item will have the appearance and name of the specified emote in the player's inventory. The emote can be triggered by firing with the item equipped.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Grant Player: Gives the instigating player an item that triggers the emote specified by Item Emote ID. The item will have the appearance and name of the specified emote in the player's inventory. The emote can be triggered by firing with the item equipped.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Exclusive Ca: If the emote is being added, this determines if the category the emote is being added to will be the only available category. If it is exclusive, players will only be able to use the emotes in this category when the device is enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_EmoteController_Device_C.Disable Play: Removes the specified music reactive particle effects from all players in the volume
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Disable Play: Removes the specified music reactive particle effects from all players in the volume
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Add or Block: Should the emote ID be given to the players, or blocked from the players so they cannot use it if they have it.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.EmoteID.Desc: The ID name for the emote this device controls.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Category Nam: The name of the category that the emote will appear in if added. Will not be used if blocking the emote.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EmoteController_V2_C.Player Effec: Which music reactive player effect to attach to players
